Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,     Please uninstall SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 from your computer. Could you confirm whether the software cannot be opened at all, or it opens but fails to connect? Then, please download and install the 2.1.1 version from the provided link.  If it still shows "cannot connect," press and hold the upgrade button on the control box while reconnecting the USB. The software should indicate that it has entered firmware upgrade mode. If the issue persists, it may be due to insufficient USB power supply. Please connect the USB cable to a rear USB3.0 blue port on your computer and avoid using a USB hub.  Once this works, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select pedals-firmware-pedals-proxultra.sfu After the update is complete, check whether the connection is normal.        https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,  When you double-click the program, it should normally open this interface. Could you confirm whether you are seeing an error message, or it simply does not open correctly? Please record a short video showing the issue, upload it to Google Drive, and make sure to grant us access so that we can review it and assist you.

      主题: Login simsonn app Maneger  
      描述:  Hi I bought a feel days ago your x pro pedal and van pro 
 How can I create loguin with this email?

合并来自工单3967  
      主题: Software don’t renilknizs  
      描述:  Hello, the Pro X Ultra pedal does not work. I installed it and did the initial configuration. After 10 minutes of testing, I turned off the PC to do other things. When I returned, it did not work! The application is blocked! The SIM Manager is not blocked. IRacing does not recognize the pedal, and the SIM Messenger software is blocked, without the possibility of moving or configuring it. I uninstalled it and reinstalled it. I tried this process throughout the day and it did not work. I have a championship on Sunday and I would like to use the Prodigy! I would like to know if you have any explanation and how to make it work?

Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,  I checked the link you provided, but Google Drive requires access permissions, so I’m unable to view it at the moment. If the device shows “Simsonn Flasher” mode, please release the recovery button on the control box and then reinsert the USB cable — it will return to normal mode.

So it's working through the link you sent for version 2.1.1 ok! Now every
time I turn off and on the PC I have to manually download and reconfigure it



On Fri, Sep 19, 2025 at 11:24 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,  Hello, the video you shared is currently not accessible. Could you please adjust the access permissions so that we can view it and assist you in resolving the issue?       Hello, please don’t worry. If the issue cannot be resolved, you can install the ToDesk software, and we will assist you remotely to fix it.       https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

That’s no work every time shot off computer and shot on app don’t recognize
pedal for it’s work need update every time


On Fri, Sep 19, 2025 at 4:24 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,  Hello, the video you shared is currently not accessible. Could you please adjust the access permissions so that we can view it and assist you in resolving the issue?         Please set the access permissions for the video on Google Drive, as we are currently unable to view its content.      Additionally, if our SIMSONN Manager software fails to open, it may be due to your computer settings. You can try testing it on a different computer, or take a photo of the error screen when opening the software and send it to us. We will help you analyze and resolve the issue.

The software sim son open but the problem is when turn off power every time
need update software and calibrate every time! How can I sold this problem ?

合并来自工单3986  
      主题: Item shared with you: "Desktop 2025.09.19 - 22.02.29.01.mp4"  
      描述:   
 
 Alcir Lima de Paula shared an item 

 
  
 
 
 Alcir Lima de Paula (alcirlp2@gmail.com) has shared the following item: 
 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eQLrInyEPJAlSHX0dUcTA2-GJo8tLtiq/view?usp=drive_link    Hello, I deleted 2.1.0 and downloaded 2.1.1, and I still have the same problem (there is no reset button, but I removed the USB cable and put it back in. It is already in the blue USB port. I have already disabled all firewalls on the PC. When I open the app, it appears like this in the video. I can't click on it in the software and it tells me to remove the USB and put it back in. It stays on Simsonn Flasher and nothing happens! There must be a way. I haven't been able to use it for 3 days.  
 
 




  
Desktop 2025.09.19 - 22.02.29.01.mp4

Hi Alcir Lima de Paula,     Please uninstall the old version on your computer, then reinstall version 2.1.2 and update the firmware. After the update, the device version should display as CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.3. If the issue persists, please feel free to contact me.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PZwHUqhhmJw0IBGDO8mGONPbrICJU3z1/view?usp=drive_link

let me know ?
